subject: Personal Finance
title: Tunnel Vision and Money
description: A micro-lesson that makes Tunnel Vision and Money usable.

hook.text: When you're behind on bills, you focus only on the next payment. Everything else disappears.

buildup.text: Scarcity creates 'tunneling' â€” intense focus on the immediate problem, blocking all else.

discovery.text: Inside the tunnel, people make brilliant short-term moves but terrible long-term ones.

twist.text: A single car repair can unravel months of careful budgeting because the tunnel hid the risk.

punchline.text: The urgent always defeats the important.
